Магистр Таллия:
Serve Gran Kain and through him we will end this reign of oppression and usher in a new and glorious age.
Brothers and sisters! When that day comes, those who betrayed us will face judgment from which they cannot hide, and our sorrow will be changed to everlasting joy!
Выучить умения
Узнать о ярлыке умений
Узнать об улучшении умений
